title: RHOBH: A Very Merry Halloween Christmas
description:
On a very special Halloween Christmas episode of Real Housewives of Beverly Hills, film royalty Jamie Lee Curtis slums it on Bravo to help her charity out. Plus, Kathy Hilton finally makes her return and Diana throws a Xmas party.

This is a Crappens on Demand video. Catch it here: https://www.patreon.com/posts/69397858
author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (benron)
